name: Sports Coaching Foundation

address: Opposite Cha-cha Nehru Park, Masab Tank

briefDescription: Sports Coaching Foundation (SCF), Masab Tank, Hyderabad -  is the only NGO in Sports and Character Building, helping build India through Sports (since 1991). It is a Non-Profit and Non-Commercial Organization. For the last 24 years, since its inception in 1991, SCF has been instilled with a true spirit of spotting young talent (especially among less-privileged children) and taking all-round sincere efforts in grooming them into promising sportsmen. Please note that a clear majority of trainees at SCF are from an under-privileged and impoverished background. SCF provides free coaching to 80% of its 600 trainees (approximately). This is an unparalleled success model of Service.
